name: Ice Cream Cat
description:
Travel through Planet Sundae with a cute cat as your guide! Visit Treacle Town and Milky Way to gather ingredients for your preferred flavor of ice cream. If you listen closely, you can determine which flavors of sugar and milk you’ll need for making different flavors of ice cream.

Ice Cream Cat is a game developed in Bitsy Game Maker (Adam Le Doux) for the 2020 notGDC Game Jam, using Borksy hacks for Dialog Choices and BitsyMuse. The music and sound effects were created in Maschine 2.
